title: P, E, R, S and T are sitting on a bench facing north. T and E are sitting together, T and R are sitting together, P is on the extreme left, E is second from extreme right. Who is sitting between P and E? - Quora

response.answer_text: In above question 5 person are sit together with north face Now in the question give T, E,R are together and because T, E &T, R sit together so T is mid of E&R.P position given question is extreme left and E position is also given second from Extreme right and T, R, S exactly position not given so combination is P, R, T, E, S In This combination all position are satisfied so Answer is R, T

E, T and R are sitting together. T is in middle. (as given in statement tha T and E sitting together T and R sitting together ) ETR or RTE P is on extreme left. E is seconds right extreme so RTE is right. PRTES is the sequence of sitting. R and T are sitting between P and E.
